name: Majeed Fahim
story: Hafiz Ajani grew up in a small village in Iran. He was trained in marksmanship from a young age by his father, who was a hunter. Hafiz joined the Iranian military as soon as he was old enough, and quickly rose through the ranks due to his skill and determination. He now serves in the OPFOR faction as a marksman, using his skills to take out enemy targets from a long distance.
